suite.name: AdicionarNoCarrinhoTest

test.name: Adicionar produto ao carrinho com sucesso

kw.name: Dado que o usuario acessa a loja Kabum
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Texto de um dos elementos deve ser
Convert To Lower Case
kw.doc: Converts string to lower case.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Convert To Lower Case
kw.doc: Converts string to lower case.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Return From Keyword
kw.msg: Returning from the enclosing user keyword.
kw.doc: Returns from the enclosing user keyword.
Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Fail
kw.arg: Nenhum dos elementos contem o texto esperado (ignorando maiusculas/minusculas): '${produto}'
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.name: Quando seleciona o primeiro produto da lista
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.msg: ${nome} = Notebook Acer Aspire 5 AMD Ryzen7-5700U, 16GB RAM, SSD 512GB, 15.6" FHD IPS, AMD Radeon, Linux, Prata - A515-45-R74N
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.msg: ${NOME_PRODUTO_PRODUTOPAGE} = Notebook Acer Aspire 5 AMD Ryzen7-5700U, 16GB RAM, SSD 512GB, 15.6" FHD IPS, AMD Radeon, Linux, Prata - A515-45-R74N
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: E informa o CEP para consultar o frete
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Entao sao exibidas as opcoes de frete disponiveis
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: E seleciona a garantia estendida com a quantidade de meses
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Entao o produto deve estar presente no carrinho com a garantia selecionada
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Contain
kw.msg: Element 'xpath=//a[contains(@class, 'productName')]' contains text 'Notebook Acer Aspire 5 AMD Ryzen7-5700U, 16GB RAM, SSD 512GB, 15.6" FHD IPS, AMD Radeon, Linux, Prata - A515-45-R74N'.
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${xpath} = xpath=//label[.="12 Meses de Garantia Estendida Kabum"]/input
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

suite.doc: Cenário: Adicionar produto ao carrinho com sucesso Este teste cobre a compra de um notebook com frete e garantia estendida.
